exceptions.tactic: intros K V f x H.
intros K' V f x H.
intros K' V' f x H.
intros K' V' f' x H.
intros K' V' f' x' H.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (f0 : ?U -> ?V) (x0 : ?U), ex_filterdiff f0 (locally x0) -> continuous f0 x0" on hypothesis of type "ex_filterdiff f (locally x)".
The reference H was not found in the current environment.

original: intros K V f x H. apply ex_derive_filterdiff in H. apply filterdiff_continuous in H. apply H.
